metaTags.metaDescription: Certificate lifecycle management solutions improve productivity and strengthen security. Discover the benefits of automated certificate lifecycle management.

leftHalf.title: Automate certificate lifecycle management
leftHalf.copy: Transport layer security (TLS) and secure sockets layer (SSL) certificates are key for building trust and establishing secure communications online. But manually managing their lifecycles is a major burden. Organizations need to automate processes while addressing business and regulatory needs.

primaryCta.elementName: Certificate lifecycle management - Hero - Primary CTA

secondaryCta.elementName: Certificate lifecycle management - Hero - Secondary CTA

relatedBlades.title: What is certificate lifecycle management?
relatedBlades.copy:
Websites use SSL/TLS certificates to verify their ownership and encrypt web traffic. These certificates are issued by certificate authorities (CAs) and are valid for a fixed length of time before they must be renewed. 

Website owners are responsible for managing certificates throughout their lifecycle — from issuance to expiration or renewal. But these manual processes often require a large amount of their time.

imageAssetFile.altText: Certificate lifecycle management - Problem section - illustration
imageAssetFile.title: Certificate lifecycle management - Problem section - illustration

columnContent.title: Time-consuming management
columnContent.description: Managing SSL/TLS certificates can be tedious, time-consuming work. Organizations need ways to streamline certificate issuance, renewal, and other tasks.

columnContent.title: Need for customization
columnContent.description: Organizations often need to customize certificates, specifying hostnames, choosing cipher suites, adjusting validity periods, or picking specific CAs.

columnContent.title: Ensuring compliance
columnContent.description: For many organizations, maintaining compliance with increasingly strict data privacy regulations and the latest encryption standards is difficult.

relatedBlades.title: Benefits of allowing Cloudflare to manage the lifecycle of SSL/TLS certificates

columnContent.title: Streamline certificate management
columnContent.description: Effective certificate lifecycle management can automate domain control validation as well as issuance and renewal of TLS certificates, eliminating manual tasks.

iconAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare arrow orange - APPROVED Web Icons

contentfulAsset.description: Cloudflare arrow orange - APPROVED Web Icons

columnContent.title: Customize certificate deployment
columnContent.description: The right certificate management solution will enable you to specify hostnames on the certificate, modify the validity period, and choose from multiple CAs.

columnContent.title: Maintain compliance
columnContent.description: Flexible tools will enable you to restrict the use of legacy cipher suites and allow connections only from traffic that supports the newest, most secure version of the TLS protocol.

columnContent.title: Keep up with certificate renewals
columnContent.description: Automating renewals can help ensure websites continue to appear in search rankings and are easily accessible by users, without requiring them to click past browser security warnings.

relatedBlades.title: Key use cases for certificate lifecycle management

columnContent.title: Automatically issue certificates
columnContent.description: Rapidly growing organizations need a way to streamline issuance of new certificates for new hostnames and web properties. A solution that issues certificates automatically can speed processes and eliminate security and privacy gaps for new domains.

columnContent.title: Bring your own custom certificates
columnContent.description: You might need to extend the validation period of a certificate, choose a specific CA, or customize a certificate in other ways. The right certificate management solution will allow you to use customized certificates to fit organizational, industry, or regulatory requirements.

columnContent.title: Retain custody of your private key
columnContent.description: Organizations in highly regulated industries cannot share their private keys. A solution that offers [keyless SSL](https://www.cloudflare.com/application-services/products/ssl/keyless-ssl/) enables these organizations to continue using TLS and leverage the cloud while keeping private keys secure on their own hardware security modules (HSMs).

columnContent.title: Ensure security redundancy
columnContent.description: Keeping backup TLS certificates is critical for avoiding gaps in protection in the event of a key compromise or CA revocation. With a lifecycle management solution that automatically backs up certificates, you can instantly switch to a valid certificate if necessary.

relatedBlades.title: Secure your web app and reduce your team's workload with Cloudflare Advanced Certificate Manager
relatedBlades.eyebrowHeading: How Cloudflare delivers certificate lifecycle management

columnContent.title: Automated management
columnContent.description: Eliminate tedious, manual tasks by letting Cloudflare automatically manage TLS certificate issuance and renewal.

columnContent.title: Automatic encryption
columnContent.description: Tighten security by automatically encrypting all new domains. Tailor encryption according to your needs and regulatory requirements.

columnContent.title: Customizable certificates
columnContent.description: List specific hostnames, establish a validity period shorter than 90 days, define acceptable cipher suites, and choose your preferred CA.

columnContent.title: Free certificate management
columnContent.description: Use the free Cloudflare Universal SSL certificate solution to reduce SSL/TLS certificate lifecycle management overhead with a simple, one-size-fits-all solution. Available for sites with only one subdomain level.

accordionElements.title: Why is certificate lifecycle management important?

content.value: Certificates are vital for securing websites and safeguarding communication with those sites. If certificates are managed poorly and allowed to expire, a website could be excluded from search results and users might see a browser warning before reaching the site, driving them to go elsewhere.

accordionElements.title: What are the benefits of certificate lifecycle management tools?

content.value: The right tools can eliminate time-consuming manual management tasks, help ensure compliance with data privacy regulations, enable teams to customize certificates, and avoid the harm that occurs when certificates unexpectedly expire.

accordionElements.title: What are common features of certificate lifecycle management solutions?

content.value: All lifecycle management solutions attempt to streamline administrative tasks. Some offer automated capabilities, such as automating issuance and renewal, or scanning for impending expiries.

Yes. The right certificate lifecycle management solution can help automate essential tasks, including issuing certificates for new hostnames, backing up certificates, and renewing certificates before they expire.
